original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit took hold of Jephthah. Jephthah travelled through the land of Gilead and of Manasseh. He arrived at Mizpah in Gilead and he prepared to fight against the Ammonites.
korean_text: 이에 여호와의 영이 입다에게 임하시니 입다가 길르앗과 므낫세를 지나서 길르앗의 미스베에 이르고 길르앗의 미스베에서부터 암몬 자손에게로 나아갈 때에

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit took hold of Jephthah
Jephthah travelled through the land of Gilead
He arrived at Mizpah in Gilead
and he prepared to fight against the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 암몬 사람들과 싸울 준비를 했다
